attributes.action: To properly resource our forces in Afghanistan
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: with fatalities increasing every week, the undersigned petition the government to send more troops to helmand province and to better equip the troops- particularly with stronger ante mine vehicles and more helicopters.  if not, pull our troops out!!! "we should not forget them!!"

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
